name: Mr. FOLDER mobile!
description:
This is mobile version of Mr. FOLDER!

Manage the running folder and collect documents that are scattered across all level!

 You are an ordinary computer folder, the main purpose of which is to collect "important" documents. No, it's not that easy, you will be hampered by various enemies and bugs that I can forget to fix.

There will be different levels in the PC and mobile versions! Since the game was designed for PC, the difficulty of the levels corresponds to the PC version. In the mobile version, the levels will have a slightly different structure and complexity, but the quality will not suffer from this :)

 This is my first game, don't judge strictly. Write your wishes and report bugs in the comments.
